---
title: "IDC for SSP"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
IDC <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/IDC.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
idc <- ts(IDC[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+338/365.25)
idc %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(idc))
```

```{r}
training_idc <- subset(idc, end=length(idc)-5)
test_idc <- subset(idc, start=length(idc)-4)
fc_training_idc<-forecast(training_idc)
fc_training_idc %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_idc)
```

```{r}
fc_training_idc
```

```{r}
fc_idc<-forecast(idc)
fc_idc %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_idc
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_idc)
```
